GSD.description:
ALSA: hda: fix potential memleak in 'add_widget_node'

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.79 by commit 7140d7aaf93da6a665b454f91bb4dc6b1de218bd. For more details please see the references link.
